questions.question: Which of these is not a pillar of sustainability?
The Trinity explosion of 1945 is taken as the beginning of the
According to Malthusian model,
options: Population grows in geometric progression, food supply increases in arithmetic progression
Population grows in geometric progression, food supply increases in geometric progression
Population grows in arithmetic progression, food supply increases in arithmetic progression
Population grows in arithmetic progression, food supply increases in geometric progression
questions.correct: Population grows in geometric progression, food supply increases in arithmetic progression

questions.question: The demographic transition sees a society move from
options: High birth rate, low death rate to low birth rate, high death rate
Low birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, low death rate
High birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, low death rate
High birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, high death rate
questions.correct: High birth rate, high death rate to low birth rate, low death rate
